00033     public:

00061 class RamDataConnProfileStorage : public DataConnProfileStorage {
00062     public:
00063         virtual BOOLEAN Open() { return TRUE; }
00064         virtual void Close() { };
00065 
00066         virtual BOOLEAN Read(Header &header) { 
00067             header = m_header;
00068             return TRUE;
00069         }
00070 
00071         virtual BOOLEAN Write(const Header &header) {
00072             m_header = header;
00073             return TRUE;
00074         }
00075 
00076         virtual BOOLEAN Read(INT recno, PersistDataConnProfile &pdcp) {
00077             pdcp = m_pdcp[recno];
00078             return TRUE;
00079         }
00080 
00081         virtual BOOLEAN Write(INT recno, const PersistDataConnProfile &pdcp) {
00082             m_pdcp[recno] = pdcp;
00083             return TRUE;
00084         }
00085 
00086     public:
00087         static Header m_header;
00088         static PersistDataConnProfile m_pdcp[c_data_conn_profile_count];
00089 
00090 };
00091 
00092 typedef RamDataConnProfileStorage MyDataConnProfileStorage;
